comment.body:
@draugrdeathlord@zeroid.bit: I would use linux if I didn't need windows for work. They issued me a brand new laptop jan 2020, and then covid, so working from home. I hate windows, but need the communication software  - my work is only using Microsoft Teams. Also I do a lot of testing for Windows based clients. I hate windows. all my home computers - even my 9 yr old's laptop use linux. I won't allow anything else. stupid windows work computers. 

Been using linux since 2008. Lubuntu is an easy one if you want to try something similar to windows at first. CrunchBang was another favorite of mine.  this garuda looks very slick.
